0.7.10.name: wordpress/markdown-quicktags
0.7.10.description:
Markdown QuickTags is a plugin for WordPress which replaces the HTML editor with a Markdown-enabled set of buttons and features. It can edit Markdown for saving, or render the finished Markdown to HTML, if you prefer. You can preview the rendered HTML at any time, and there's even a full-screen editing mode. Options can be set in the Settings->Markdown QuickTags panel of your wp-admin section.

Installation

Just download and unzip the file, upload the resulting folder to your wp-content/plugins directory and enable the plugin from the Plugins page. You can also upload the plugin using the Upload feature within the Plugins page. Once activated, your HTML editor is automatically replaced.

Requirements

This is currently very beta, and has only been tested on Wordpress 3.0+, and only on Mac. It works in Firefox 4, Safari 5 and Chrome. I doubt it will wor
